capture_basic_1.title: Capture Practice 1
capture_basic_1.hint: The white stone has only one liberty.
capture_basic_1.explanation: The white stone has one liberty left; occupy it to capture.

wrong_moves.8,10: This move doesn't capture the white stone.
wrong_moves.10,10: Still wrong. Look for the last liberty.

ladder_basic_1.title: Ladder Practice 1
ladder_basic_1.objective: Chase the white stone with a ladder
ladder_basic_1.explanation: Keep atari along the edge to drive the stone into the ladder.

capture_basic_2.title: Capture Practice 2
capture_basic_2.hint: The white stone has one liberty.

wrong_moves.5,5: You didn't take the last liberty.
wrong_moves.3,5: Still one move short of capture.

wrong_moves.6,2: You didn't close the final liberty.

atari_corner_1.title: Corner Atari
atari_corner_1.hint: The corner stone has two liberties.
atari_corner_1.explanation: Atari at (1,2) to tighten the net.

wrong_moves.2,1: Also an atari, but (1,2) is tighter.

atari_side_1.title: Side Atari
atari_side_1.objective: Atari the two stones on the side
atari_side_1.explanation: Play at (5,5) to atari and reduce to one liberty.

ladder_corner_2.title: Ladder Practice 2
ladder_corner_2.explanation: Continue the ladder to cut off escape.

net_basic_1.title: Net Practice 1
net_basic_1.explanation: Play at (3,5) to form a net.

net_basic_2.title: Net Practice 2
net_basic_2.explanation: Play at (1,7) to complete the net.

tesuji_cut_1.title: Cut Tesuji
tesuji_cut_1.explanation: Cut at (4,5) to split the white stones.

tesuji_snapback_1.title: Snapback Tesuji
tesuji_snapback_1.objective: Use a snapback to gain initiative
tesuji_snapback_1.explanation: White throws in at (2,2) to set up a snapback.

tesuji_eye_1.title: Eye-Making Tesuji
tesuji_eye_1.explanation: Play at (3,3) to form an eye.

capture_basic_7.title: Capture Practice 7
capture_basic_7.explanation: Play at (3,5) to capture both stones.

atari_corner_2.title: Corner Atari 2
atari_corner_2.explanation: Atari at (1,1) to leave White with one liberty.

atari_side_2.title: Side Atari 2
atari_side_2.explanation: Play at (5,4) to reduce White to one liberty.

ladder_basic_2.title: Ladder Practice 3
ladder_basic_2.explanation: Atari at (7,2) and keep chasing into a ladder.

ladder_basic_3.title: Ladder Practice 4
ladder_basic_3.explanation: Atari at (3,6) and keep chasing along the side.

net_basic_3.title: Net Practice 3
net_basic_3.explanation: Play at (5,5) to complete the net.

net_basic_4.title: Net Practice 4
net_basic_4.explanation: Play at (2,3) to finish the net.

tesuji_double_atari_1.title: Double Atari Tesuji
tesuji_double_atari_1.hint: Look for a point that hits both stones.
tesuji_double_atari_1.explanation: Play at (5,4) to atari both white stones.

tesuji_throw_in_1.title: Throw-in Tesuji
tesuji_throw_in_1.objective: Throw in to reduce the eye
tesuji_throw_in_1.hint: Throw in at the eye point.
tesuji_throw_in_1.explanation: Throw in at (2,2) to reduce White's eye space.

tesuji_connect_1.title: Connection Tesuji
tesuji_connect_1.explanation: Play at (4,3) to connect the groups.

tesuji_cut_2.title: Cut Tesuji 2
tesuji_cut_2.hint: The cut is in the middle.

tesuji_eye_2.title: Eye-Making Tesuji 2
tesuji_eye_2.explanation: Play at (4,4) to secure an eye.

tesuji_peep_1.title: Peep Tesuji
tesuji_peep_1.explanation: Play at (4,4) to force a response.

tesuji_bamboo_joint_1.title: Bamboo Joint Tesuji
tesuji_bamboo_joint_1.explanation: Play at (3,4) to make a bamboo joint.

tesuji_hane_1.title: Hane Tesuji
tesuji_hane_1.explanation: Play at (4,5) to hane and attack.

life_death_4.title: Life & Death 4
life_death_4.hint: Make an eye in the corner.

life_death_6.title: Life & Death 6
life_death_6.explanation: Play at (4,4) to make an eye and live.
